args.text: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.dll --output realcorecli.dllcurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli --output realcoreclicurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.deps.json --output realcorecli.deps.jsoncurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.pdb --output realcorecli.pdbcurl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.runtimeconfig.json --output realcorecli.runtimeconfig.jsondotnet realcorecli.dll

curl.exe https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.dll --output realcorecli.dllcurl.exe https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli --output realcoreclicurl.exe https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.deps.json --output realcorecli.deps.jsoncurl.exe https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.pdb --output realcorecli.pdbcurl.exe https://raw.githubusercontent.com/realvisualstudio/RealCorecli_Releases/master/realcorecli.runtimeconfig.json --output realcorecli.runtimeconfig.jsondotnet realcorecli.dll
